data.description: Introduction to empirical consumer science research methods, with an emphasis on application. Covers different types of data structures commonly encountered, statistical properties of data, bivariate and multivariate linear regression models.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO QUANTITATIVE METHODS IN SOCIAL SCIENCE

data.description: Research on the application of modern econometric techniques commonly used in empirical consumer research with an emphasis on causal inference.
data.title: CAUSAL MODELS IN HOUSEHOLD AND CONSUMER RESEARCH
